updates.title: Major AI summit in New Delhi expected to draw top executives from OpenAI, Meta, Google, and Anthropic as Sam Altman plans first India visit in nearly a year, signaling intensified AI competition in emerging markets.

OpenAI reportedly appoints Barret Zoph to lead enterprise push just one week after rejoining the company, indicating aggressive 2026 strategy to capture corporate market share as voice AI infrastructure startup LiveKit hits $1B valuation.

New research benchmark reveals most leading AI models fail at actual white-collar work tasks in consulting, investment banking, and law, raising questions about workplace AI agent readiness despite industry hype.

Yann LeCun's new venture AMI Labs focuses on 'world model' AI development after leaving Meta, while startup Humans& raises funding to build next-generation foundation models specifically for collaboration rather than chat interfaces.

Meta temporarily pauses teen access to AI characters globally across all apps while developing updated version, as TikTok's new US ownership brings expanded data collection including precise location tracking under revised privacy policy.
